stPageAllocator Class Reference

#include <stPage.h>

Public Member Functions

 stPageAllocator (stSize pageSize)
 
stPage * Create ()

Detailed Description

This class is the allocator implementation that allows the use of the stInstanceCacheTemplate

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

stPageAllocator::stPageAllocator ( stSize  pageSize)
inline

Creates a new allocator for stPage instances. All pages will have pageSize bytes.

Parameters
pageSizeThe size of the new pages created bye this allocator.
